author: aguzmant
content: Yes def multitoken, in my mind the 80/20 play here is to support private transfers of ETH + ERC20 with subcent cost and other harder-to-measure but desired properties

author: aguzmant
content:
Lets say Plasma Fold (will be renamed to Plasma Blind) is just one bet into the expanding design space on here.

From my POV Kohaku helps two parts: i) showcase how to integrate all these protocols with (hopefully) great UX (ala Zashi) and ii) lowering the cost of integration for devs (devex)

author: aguzmant
content: For I've seen: mixers, shielded pools, encrypted tokens, tee-based, folding-based, mpc-based, full zk-based... so many exploding design space
